<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Shard of the Third Seal](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1735)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Crown of the Kobold King</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Crown of the Kobold King](/Sources.aspx?ID=148) pg. 117

**Price** 600 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This stone fragment from the _Third Seal_ retains a tiny sliver of that legendary item's power. The shard sheds light constantly, with the effects of a [torch](/Equipment.aspx?ID=60) requiring no oxygen and generating no heat. The flame can be covered or hidden, but it can't be smothered or quenched.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> envision, Interact;     **Effect** You generate the effects of a [_disrupt undead_](/Spells.aspx?ID=79) cantrip, heightened to 3rd level.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> envision, Interact;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** By passing the shard over a creature or object, you can produce the effects of a [_nondetection_](/Spells.aspx?ID=209) spell on that target.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> envision, Interact;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** By gripping the shard tightly and waving it before you, you can produce the effects of a [_levitate_](/Spells.aspx?ID=170) spell on yourself.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
